title: How food may be affecting your mood with Psychiatrist Dr Uma Naidoo
description:
In this weeks Wednesday Wisdoms episode you will hear from Harvard trained Nutritional Psychiatrist, and best selling author, Dr Uma Naidoo on the parallel pandemic (mental illness) and how food may be affecting your mood.

Grab a copy of Dr Naidoo's new book here
